title: july 19: when hieroglyphics were unmasked at last
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the 1799 discovery of the Rosetta Stone, an ancient Egyptian stele whose texts served as the key to deciphering hieroglyphics. After, she reflects on the release of animated character Peppa Pig’s first album, appropriately titled My First Album. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
